message:
This GTA 4 mod is amazing. When will we being to see games look like this in general I wonder? 

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=pEHtzSz8FT0

[img]http://i.imgur.com/EZJHI.jpg[/img]
There seems to be quite a lot of buzz about this mod at the moment. I'll have to look to see if it'll work with the Steam version of GTA4.
I saw this vid yesterday.  Does it do anything else besides up the polygon count on the cars?
Sorry, I should have given a helpful answer: I think all the road textures are new, and there's a ton of post-processing effects with regards to motion blur and lighting. The videos are gorgeous.
It must have been a while since you last saw the GTA4 engine...
Oh?  I thought that was just the PC version "looking better".

Nono, I got that (from your post).  It was just that I had thought / gathered from the video's description that it was basically the vehicle geometry, and so I thought the other improvements were just native to the PC version.
I think iCEhancer  itself is just new shaders. The rest are various model and texture mods.

A version was just released that no longer needs an arbitrarily patched retail version, i.e. you can install it on Steam:

http://www.gtagaming.com/downloads/gta-iv/misc-mods/9503
